

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<list>
#include<numeric>
#include<cstring>
#include<set>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<bitset>

using namespace std;

#define FOR(i, a, b) for(int i=(a); i<(b); i++)
#define IFOR(i, a, b) for(int i=(a); i>=(b); i--)
#define FORD(i, a, b, c) for(int i=(a); i<(b); i+=(c))
#define REP(i, n) for(int i=0; i<(n); i++)
#define MAX(a, b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a, b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define P printf
#define S scanf
#define SZ(x) ((int)x.size())
#define PB(x) push_back(x)
#define INF 1000000000
#define V vector
typedef V<int> VI;
typedef V<string> VS;
typedef long long LL;
typedef pair<int, int> PII;
int abc(int a, int b, int c){
    int ans=1;
    while(b>0){
        if (b%2) ans = (ans*a) % c;
        a=(a*a)%c;
        b/=2;
    }
    return ans;
}
int rec(int b, int n)
{
    return n==1?b%10:rec(abc(b, n, 10), n-1);
}   

main()
{
      char s[20];
      int n,ans=0;
      while(1){
          ans=0;
          scanf("%s", s);
          if(!strcmp(s,"#")) break;
          sscanf(s, "%d", &n);
          REP(i, n){
             ans= (ans+rec(i+1,i+1))%10;
          }
          P("%d\n", ans);
      }
}
